name: mendel

datasource.data_def: {label: 'deleterious', data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)'}
{label: 'favorable', data: d2, lines: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)'}
{label: 'neutrals', data: d3, lines: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,0,200)'}

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Generations', axisLabelOffset: 0, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Mutations', axisLabelOffset: 0, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }
plots.title: Average mutation/individual

datasource.data_def: {label: 'fitness', data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(255,50,50)'}
{label: 'pop size', data: d2, lines: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,0,255)', yaxis: 2, position: 'right'}

plots.options: xaxes: [ { axisLabel: 'Generations', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 } ],  yaxes: [ { min: 0, axisLabel: 'Fitness', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, { position: 'right', min: 0, axisLabel: 'Population Size', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12} ], legend: { position: 'se'}, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Fitness & Population Size History

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Dominant', data: d1, bars: { show: true, autoWidth: true }, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)' }
{ label: 'Recessive', data: d2, bars: { show: true, autoWidth: true }, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)'}

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Mutational Fitness Degradation', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, transform: function (x) { return -Math.log(x); }, inverseTransform: function (x) { return -Math.exp(x); }, ticks: [[1.0,'1'],[0.1,'1e-1'],[0.01,'1e-2'],[1e-3,'1e-3'], [1e-4,'1e-4'],[1e-5,'1e-5'],[1e-6,'1e-6'], [1e-7,'1e-7'], [1e-8,'1e-8']],tickDecimals: 6, max: 1.0 }, yaxis: { axisLabelOffset: -220, axisLabel: 'Fraction of Mutations Retained in Genome', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, legend: { position: 'nw' }
plots.title: Distribution of accumulated mutations (deleterious)

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Dominant', data: d1, bars: { show: true, autoWidth: true }, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)' }
{ label: 'Recessive', data: d2, bars: { show: true, autoWidth: true }, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)'}

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Mutational Fitness Enhancement', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, transform: function (x) { return Math.log(x); }, ticks: [[1.0,'1'],[0.1,'1e-1'],[0.01,'1e-2'],[1e-3,'1e-3'],[1e-4,'1e-4'],[1e-5,'1e-5'],[1e-6,'1e-6'],[1e-7,'1e-7'],[1e-8,'1e-8']], tickDecimals: 6, max: <max_fav_fitness_gain> },yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Fraction of Mutations Retained in Genome', axisLabelOffset: -220, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, max: 10}, legend: { position: 'nw' }
plots.title: Distribution of accumulated mutations (beneficial)

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Deleterious threshold', data: d1, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)'}
{ label: 'Favorable threshold', data: d2, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)'}

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Generations', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Selection Threshold', axisLabelOffset: -120, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Selection threshold history

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Theoretical', data: d1, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)' }
{ label: 'Dominant', bars: { show: true, barWidth: 0.0001 }, data: d2, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)' }
{ label: 'Recessive', bars: { show: true, barWidth: 0.0001 }, data: d3, color: 'rgb(0,0,200)' }

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Fitness Effect', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, ticks: 10, min: -0.01, max: 0.0}, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Frequency', axisLabelOffset: -50, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, ticks: 10, min: 0.0, max: 0.01}, legend: { position: 'nw' }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Near neutral deleterious effects

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Theoretical', data: d1, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)' }
{ label: 'Dominant', bars: { show: true, barWidth: 0.0001 }, data: d2, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)' }
{ label: 'Recessive', bars: { show: true, barWidth: 0.0001 }, data: d3, color: 'rgb(0,0,200)' }

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Fitness Effect', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, ticks: 10, min: 0.0, max: 0.01}, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Frequency', axisLabelOffset: -50, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, ticks: 10, min: 0.0, max: 0.01}, legend: { position: 'ne' }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Near neutral beneficial effects

datasource.data_def: { label: '<< Before selection', bars: { show: true, barWidth: 0.01 }, data: d1, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)' }
{ label: '<< After selection', bars: { show: true, barWidth: 0.01 }, data: d2, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)' }

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Fitness', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Number of Individuals', axisLabelOffset: -120, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, ticks: 10, min: 0.0 }, y2axis: { ticks: 5, min: 0.0, max: 1.0 }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Selection effects

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Deleterious', data: d1, bars: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)'}
{ label: 'Favorable', data: d2, bars: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)'}
{ label: 'Neutrals', data: d3, bars: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,0,200)'}
{label: "Initial alleles", data: d4, bars: { show: true, autoWidth: true }, color: "rgb(0,0,0)"}

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Allele Frequency', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, yaxis: { min: 0, axisLabel: 'Number of Alleles', axisLabelOffset: -100, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Allele Frequencies

datasource.data_def: { label: 'Deleterious', data: d1, bars: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(200,0,0)'}
{ label: 'Favorable', data: d2, bars: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,200,0)'}
{ label: 'Neutrals', data: d3, bars: { show: true }, color: 'rgb(0,0,200)'}

plots.options: xaxis: { axisLabel: 'Allele Frequency Frequency (1-99)', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12, min:1, max:99 }, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Total Number of Variants', axisLabelOffset: -100, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Total number of variants vs. allele frequencies

datasource.data_def: {label: "Initial alleles", data: d1, bars: { show: true }, color: "rgb(200,0,0)"}

plots.options: legend: { position: "nw"}, xaxis: { axisLabel: "Allele frequency"}, yaxis: { min: 0, axisLabel: "Number of alleles" }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Initial Allele Frequencies

description: Mendel's Accountant (MENDEL) is an advanced numerical simulation program for modeling genetic change over time
